title: Metal gargoyle
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all gargoyles, see [list of constructs](/List_of_constructs "List of constructs").*

| metal gargoyle 9 [![Metal gargoyle.png](/images/4/41/Metal_gargoyle.png)](/File:Metal_gargoyle.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                      | 28-59                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                          | 8                                                                                                                                                                                                          |

| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                  | 20                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                            | 4                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                      | 64                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Attack1                                                                                             | 19 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                         |
| Attack2                                                                                             | 10 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                         |
| Attack3                                                                                             | 10 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                         |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                             | [rElec++](/Electricity "Electricity"), [rPois+](/Poison "Poison"), [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy"), [rTorm](/Torment "Torment"), [rRot+++](/Rot "Rot"), [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                   | None                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

|   |                                      |
| - | ------------------------------------ |
|   | A hideous metal statue come to life. |

## Useful Info

**Metal gargoyles** are stronger, tougher, and slower than regular [gargoyles](/Gargoyle_\(monster\) "Gargoyle (monster)"), but are otherwise identical. They inhabit [the Iron City of Dis](/The_Iron_City_of_Dis "The Iron City of Dis").

## Tips & Tricks

By the time you encounter them, metal gargoyles are nearly harmless, at least in comparison to everything else you'll be facing. They are easy targets for [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction"), causing them to explode and injure all monsters standing nearby.

## History

Metal gargoyles were replaced with [war gargoyles](/War_gargoyle "War gargoyle") in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

Metal gargoyle

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all gargoyles, see list of constructs.

metal gargoyle 9 
HP 28-59
HD 8
XP 205
Speed 7
AC 20
EV 4
Will 64
Attack1 19 (bite: plain)
Attack2 10 (claw: plain)
Attack3 10 (claw: plain)
Resistances rElec++, rPois+,
rN+++, rTorm,
rRot+++, rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence High
Uses Open doors
Holiness Non-living
Size Medium
Type gargoyle, metal gargoyle
Flags Artificial
Flying
A hideous metal statue come to life.

Useful Info

Metal gargoyles are stronger, tougher, and slower than regular gargoyles, but are otherwise identical. They inhabit the Iron City of Dis.

Tips & Tricks

By the time you encounter them, metal gargoyles are nearly harmless, at least in comparison to everything else you'll be facing. They are easy targets for Lee's Rapid Deconstruction, causing them to explode and injure all monsters standing nearby.

History

Metal gargoyles were replaced with war gargoyles in 0.14.

They are easy targets for [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]], causing them to explode and injure all monsters standing nearby. ==History== Metal gargoyles were replaced with [[war gargoyle]]s in [[0.14]].
